downloadTitle: Ribbon customization for Project 2010 - Favorites tab
downloadDescription: Download a customized Favorites tab for Project 2010.
detailsSection: Customized tab for the ribbon in Microsoft Project 2010. You can import this customized tab called Favorites into Project 2010. Important When you import a ribbon customization file, you lose all prior ribbon and Quick Access Toolbar customizations. If you think that you might want to revert to the customization that you currently have, you should export them before importing any new customizations.
installInstructionSection:
1. Download this file.
  2. In Project 2010, click the File tab.
  3. Under Help, click Options.
  4. Click Customize Ribbon.
  5. Click Import customization file.
